definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
Panmunjom village on the DMZ between North and South Korea
pinyin: Ban3 men2 dian4 ting2 zhan4 cun1

sentences.english: RRM will develop more storefronts for serving the public.
sentences.chinese: 为了更好的服务大众，日日美企业准备开更多的门店。

sentences.english: There may be stores that specifically make gift baskets listed in the phone book.
sentences.chinese: 可能有专门店在电话中作礼品篮上市书。

sentences.english: It currently operates 353 stores in China.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔玛目前在华总共运营着353家门店。

sentences.english: Anderson says half of online orders are now picked up in stores.
sentences.chinese: 安德森称，现在有一半的网络订单都是从门店自提。

sentences.english: More recently, IKEA has had problems in Russia, where it has 12 stores.
sentences.chinese: 最近，宜家在它有着12家门店的俄罗斯遇到了问题。

sentences.english: Lines were forming Thursday at Apple stores and Softbank outlets in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 周四，东京的苹果门店和软库分支机构外排起了长队。

sentences.english: Local Villa is a high-end restaurant makes Chongqing style hot-pot.
sentences.chinese: 渝舍是一家经营重庆火锅的高档门店。

sentences.english: The two sides met in the border village of Panmunjom in the Demilitarized Zone.
sentences.chinese: 两国高层军事谈判在非军事区内的板门店举行。

sentences.english: It is located in Weisan Road, which formed spontaneously from the store down the street.
sentences.chinese: 位于县城经三路，由沿街门店自发而成。

sentences.english: Last Sept. 30, the two Koreas hold military talks in Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 去年9月30日，朝韩双方曾在板门店举行军事会谈。

sentences.english: Cards holders may enjoy 10% discount from JAZZ's and our co-operation partners.
sentences.chinese: 凭此卡可在本公司各门店及合作伙伴处享有九折优惠。

sentences.english: North Koreans work in the fields near Panmunjom in the demilitarized zone.
sentences.chinese: 在非军事区板门店附近，北朝鲜人在田里干活儿。

sentences.english: Pre- representatives from both countries appeared amicable as they met at the truth village of Panmunjom on the border.
sentences.chinese: 双方前代表在两国边境村庄板门店会晤时显得很友好。

sentences.english: The closure of PARKnSHOP's stores results from its improper operation.
sentences.chinese: 百佳超市关闭门店的根源还是在于自身经营不善。

sentences.english: The figures include in-store and online sales, and exclude autos.
sentences.chinese: 数据包括门店的销售和网上销售，不包含汽车业。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
